title: An engineered lactate oxidase based electrochemical sensor for continuous detection of biomarker lactic acid in human sweat and serum
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Qingrong He, Cheng Wang, Rohit Jain, James Byrnes, Erik R. Farquhar, Elliot Reed, Elizabeth Berezovsky, Mark R. Chance, David Lodowski, Ran An
